title: Some Nations Still Ill-Equipped To Deal With Ebola
teaser: There has been a dramatic shortfall of Ebola-related equipment in Sierra Leone and other countries battling the disease. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Steve McAndrew about the logistical challenges of responding to the outbreak.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
